column7: Nonlinear dynamics, vector fields and flows, Lyapunov stability theory, regular and singular perturbations, averaging, integral manifolds, input-output and input-to-state stability, and various design applications in control systems and robotics. Same as ME 546 and SE 520. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: ECE 515 and MATH 444 or MATH 447.
column9: Same as ME 546 and SE 520. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: ECE 515 and MATH 444 or MATH 447.
